title: Debonair Quinn?
body:
Okay, it may have been inspired by this piece of fanart, in which all of the Demacian females are maids, but I'd think it'd make more sense for Quinn to be wearing a suit. She could be wearing a long tailed suit (she already has those 'tailfeather' things in her normal outfit) and Valor can have what he's wearing in the picture, AKA an adorable bowtie. Maybe even a tophat?

I can think of any different spell effects, but that's what the 750 rp price tag is for, right?
